data.event: Augusta was settled in 1793 by a man named Gunn, whose son, Peter Smith Gunn, was the first child born in the town.

event.title: the next year and Augusta was created

data.event: Organization was successful the next year and Augusta was created as a town simultaneously with the creation of Oneida County on March 15, 1798.

event.title: the creation of Oneida County on March 15, 1798

data.event: Organization was successful the next year and Augusta was created as a town simultaneously with the creation of Oneida County on March 15, 1798.
The first town meeting was held on April 3, 1798.
